body:
Hello, I'm vsplesk101 as usual, but you can call me vs! So im working on a "Nebula" map and i thought why not give you guys a sneak peak? I mean whats wrong with that? *Note: I am not showing the whole map, nor is it done! So you will be surprised when i Hopefully  release it! :D

Here is the spawn and a "starter iron mine": http://imgur.com/sIYAwEg 
Alright, I hope you enjoyed the sneak peak xD, So... umm goodbye
 
Have a nice day! -vsplesk101

*EDIT: The map is called: StarGaze ;)
 
-End of the day progress: Completed orange team spawn, 2 monuments, Iron mine, xp bottles, enchantment, Started purple team, finished 33.333% of it, 
Pros: For people who like long games will LOVE this map!, Tunnelers protection (bedrock), 
Small map (easy to get kills), Pretty! :3
Cons: For people who like short games will HATE this map!, Not easy to mine the monument (makes for an interesting game), Small map (Easy to die), Forced to get armor (Mining iron, cause with leather boots and hat, not gonna cut it), 32 block gap between (orange, or purple) Spawn to center.
 
Gear : Leather - Hat, boots | Iron - Sword, Ax | Diamond - Pick | golden - Carrots (64x), apples (1x) | Arrow (64x) | Bow (1x) | Jungle log (32x) | [Standard] Glass (64x) | ...
 
 More to come! -vsplesk101                Published Discussion: July 26th, 2014! Friday!

title: *Vsplesk's map!
